name: OHOTA KREPKOE
description:
OXOTA KREPKOE is a universal solution to problems with lack of time, money and health to meet the male need for dominance over the "mother of nature"!

The game offers every hunter to plunge into the huge world of fields, meadows, forests, coniferous and deciduous, lakes and mountains. Dynamic change of day and night will enhance the sense of presence. The rustle of grass and dry leaves underfoot will completely immerse the player in this amazing world.

There are not so many animals in the game. Wolves - your main threat! They fast and dangerous animals, feel you for a mile! There are plans to add roe deer, deer, fox, wild boar, etc.

Well, if you are VERY lucky, you can find a bottle of foam drink in the small house on the lake! Booze will make of a sweet botanist, a killing machine!
